short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show YouTube subscriber counts with channel names everywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly see YouTube subscriber counts alongside channel names everywhere!

YouTube does not display subscriber counts alongside channel names by default, except on video detail pages and channel search results. This extension enhances your browsing experience by showing subscriber counts next to channel names across various YouTube pages, including the home feed, recommended videos, comments, search results, and playlists. Quickly assess a channel's credibility and make more informed decisions about what to watch.

Tags: YouTube subscriber count, YouTube extension, display subscriber count, YouTube channel stats, YouTube browsing enhancement, YouTube search results, YouTube home feed, YouTube comments, YouTube playlists
